マンチェスター・ユナイテッド新トレーニング場の設備刷新と選手の反応 - AIサッカーまとめ

▼詳細はこちら

external.description:
マンチェスター・ユナイテッドのトム・ヒートンGKは、新しいトレーニング場の理髪店でのスタッフの利用状況について尋ねられ、笑いながらダロットを指さして「彼が最初に来た」と述べました。  
理髪店の隣にはF1シミュレーターがあり、現時点でアーデン・ヘブン選手がトップタイムを記録していますが、マウント選手はやや遅れています。  
これらの小さな改善は、クラブ内のイメージ刷新を目指し、アモリム監督が長年続いた有害な文化を排除し、団結と絆を育む努力の一環として導入されました。  
トイレにはスマート尿器が設置されており、選手の脱水状態を測定可能です。  
また、医療室にはMRIやCTスキャン、最新のDEXAスキャナーがあり、7分で選手の身体構成や骨密度、左右の差異を詳細に分析し、年々追跡します。  
外部には、選手たちの要望に応え新たにパデルコートの建設計画も進行中です。  
この12ヶ月で約5,000万ポンドを投じて刷新されたカリントンのトレーニング拠点は、かつての陰鬱な「うさぎの巣」や「地下の病院」と比べて、インスピレーションを与える環境へと変貌を遂げました。

record.text:
リバプール新星ケルケズ21歳の自信と挑戦意欲 - AIサッカーまとめ

▼詳細はこちら

external.description:
リバプールの新加入選手、ミロス・ケルケズは若くして自信に満ち溢れ、冷静沈着な性格を持つ21歳のフルバックです。  
彼はセルビア出身で、幼少期はストリートサッカーやパルクールで遊びながら育ち、独特のメンタルを形成しました。  
ヨーロッパ各地でプレー経験を積み、アヤックスやACミラン、ハンガリーのギョールなどを経て、プレミアリーグのバ Bournemouthに加入し、その実力を証明しました。  
彼はLiverpoolの伝統的な競争の激しい環境に自然に適応し、「ポジション争いはいつもある」と受け入れており、日々のトレーニングと試合を大切にしています。  
また、彼は最高速度が非常に高く、1シーズンで233.4マイルを走破し、843回のスプリントを記録し、そのスピードとスタミナは突出しています。  
ケルケズは自身のスピードを神から授かった才能と考え、「プレッシャーはない」と語りつつも、Liverpoolの一員として常に高いパフォーマンスを求められる環境に順応し、戦いの準備を進めています。  
また、彼はマンチェスター・ユナイテッドに移籍した仲間のドミニク・スボツルアイとも交流し、新天地での期待と覚悟を持っています。

record.text:
マンU新加入セスコが語る未来とクラブの挑戦 - AIサッカーまとめ

▼詳細はこちら

external.description:
マンチェスター・ユナイテッドは、73.7百万ポンドで獲得したベルギー代表ベンジャミン・セスコが、ルーベン・アモリム監督のもとクラブを再びトップに押し上げることができると確信したため、オールド・トラフォードへ移籍したと語った。  
昨シーズン、同クラブはプレミアリーグ史上最低の成績を記録し、15位に終わったが、その後のプレシーズンは好調で、新たな50百万ポンドのトレーニンググラウンドやマテウス・クニア、ブライアン・ムブーモの加入で期待を高めている。  
セスコの移籍により、今夏の総支出は2億ポンドを超えた。彼は自分の契約について、「マンチェスター・ユナイテッドの歴史は特別だが、何よりも未来にワクワクしている」と語り、クラブの成長と再び最もタイトルを狙えるチームへと進化できると確信していると述べた。  
クラブの温かく家族的な雰囲気や前向きなエネルギーを感じ取り、自身の最大限のパフォーマンスを発揮できる場所だと理解している。  
また、ルーベン・アモリムやチームメートと共に成功を目指す意欲を示した。  
セスコは昨シーズンRBライプツィヒで21ゴール、6アシストを記録し、2021年にスロベニア代表史上最年少デビューを飾って以降、代表では41キャップに16ゴールを挙げている。  
ユナイテッドはニューカッスルと争った末、欧州大会出場権がなくとも彼を獲得できると判断し、引き抜いた。  
フットボールディレクターのジェイソン・ウィロックスは、セスコのスピードとフィジカルを持ち、世界的に見ても素晴らしい才能だと評価し、ルーベン監督やパフォーマンスチームの指導のもと、彼が世界水準の選手へと成長できる環境が揃っていると強調した。  
ユナイテッドへの加入意欲を示した新加入選手の姿勢は、クラブの魅力と大志を裏付けており、今後のチーム強化に期待が高まっている。
external.title: マンU新加入セスコが語る未来とクラブの挑戦 - AIサッカーまとめ

record.text:
August 2000, Klein-Ai schaut zum ersten Mal Digimon.

August 2025, (mittlerweile nicht mehr ganz so klein) Ai hört und sieht "Leb deinen Traum" live performed.

Ich kann immer noch nicht glauben, dass das heute tatsächlich passiert ist.

Somehow, one picture of two women kissing cured my whole art experience, singlehandedly silenced my imposter syndrome and made me not care about reception of my art anymore. And on top of this, it, objectivly looking, was not even the best piece I ever did nor was it the most self indulgent. 
Wild.

The original idea was to have art accompany all the bits I share but I might need to revert back on that since it's pretty time consuming (or add more sketches in between full artworks for some posts idk 🤔). There will be more (also for other fandoms), but it'll take time I guess

Using #Positron with my #RandomWalker and #TidyDensity packages to visualize 2000 Empirical Bootstraps of mtcars mpg

#R #RStats

images.alt:
library(TidyDensity)
library(tidyverse)

x <- mtcars$mpg

boot_tbl <- tidy_empirical(x, .num_sims = 2000)

atb <- RandomWalker::get_attributes(boot_tbl)

dat_tbl <- boot_tbl |>
  group_by(x) |>
  mutate(
    conf_hi = ci_hi(dy),
    conf_lo = ci_lo(dy),
    mean_dy = mean(dy)
  ) |>
  ungroup()

dat_tbl |>
  ggplot(
    aes(x = x, y = dy, group = sim_number)
  ) +
  geom_line(color = "lightgrey", alpha = .2) +
  geom_line(
    aes(y = conf_hi),
    color = "red",
    linetype = "dashed",
    alpha = .618,
    linewidth = .3
  ) +
  geom_line(
    aes(y = conf_lo),
    color = "red",
    linetype = "dashed",
    alpha = .618,
    linewidth = .3
  ) +
  geom_line(
    aes(y = mean_dy),
    color = "black",
    alpha = .618,
    linetype = "dashed",
    linewidth = .3
  ) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(
    title = "Bootstrap Density of mtcars mpg",
    x = "MPG",
    y = "dy",
    subtitle = paste0(
      "Distribution Type: ", atb$dist_with_params, "\n",
      "Simulations: ", atb$.num_sims
    ),
    caption = paste0(
      "Number of Data Points: ", atb$.n
    )
  )

I probably don’t disagree with you on any of your fears, but it’s also undeniable it’s positively impacted my life to a degree.

images.alt: "A pileated woodpecker slices through the sky like a living arrow, its wings outstretched in a powerful, mid-flight beat. The backdrop is a flawless canvas of blue, unmarred by cloud or distraction, allowing the bird’s striking features to command full attention. Its crimson crest blazes like a flame atop its head, a bold contrast to the sleek black and white plumage that ripples with motion. The long, chisel-like beak points forward with intent, as if the bird is carving its path through the air. Each feather is crisply defined, catching the light in a way that reveals both strength and grace. The image freezes a moment of wild precision—an airborne sculpture of instinct and elegance. In the upper right corner, the subtle watermark “© Swede’s Photographs” quietly honors the artist behind the lens." Copilot

In the UE5 material, I select a "random" (based on vert colour input) channel from a packed texture using a Switch and use that as the alpha for a '3ColorBlend' to colourise it.
I also hueshift the final colour a bit, so even the same texture looks different book to book.

🧵3/3

For this book shelf object (a single mesh), I replace the World Position input (X, Y, Z) for a Vertex Colour input (R, G, B).

I got Copilot to write me a simple Maya script that applies a random vert colour to the selected objects, combined them and exported to UE5...

🧵2/3

Some TechArt on Curse of Cards:

Many know the shader tech of random object colour using world position - but a mesh has only one position.
Great for the odd book, but not so great for a library...

Ukraine and Europe have put forward their counterproposal to Trump at today's meeting in England.

According to their proposal, any peaceful settlement must be based on the following principles:

1. A ceasefire must occur before any further steps are taken;

2. Territorial exchanges can only happen on a reciprocal basis: if Ukraine withdraws from some regions, Russia must withdraw from others;

3. Any territorial concessions by Kyiv must be backed by ironclad security guarantees

record.text: Дура вместе с майором садятся вечерком почитать твои чаты...

Цены во ВВ может и не самые дешевые, но мне нравится качество.
Сидим вот с Copilot на основе GPT-5 высчитываем выгодные мясные позиции.
Уточняю для тех, кто не в РФ, у нас всё стало дорого.

Одним очень жарким летом, перед выходом из дома я мочил футболку в воде, чтобы было полегче
Помогало на первые минут 15-20, а потом она высыхала прям на мне

Mais ça correspondait tout à fait à ce qui était prévu : des réponses à des questions d'urbanisme, avec des interprétations et des références… mais rédigé par un outil sans aucune compréhension de ce qu'il fait, alignant juste des mots selon la probabilité de correspondance du résultat à la demande.

Ma compagne travaille en urbanisme aussi, on a testé au début, pour voir si on obtenir des réponses intéressantes. On a très vite abandonné, entre les références inappropriées, les jurisprudences imaginaires et les erreurs grossières d'interprétation, la quasi totalité est à jeter.

Je ne vois que trop bien la situation. Madame travaille en urbanisme, on a très très vite vu la limite, donc elle ne l'utilise pas. À mon échelle en dev web, je vois les clients et les commerciaux qui font rédiger tout et n'importe quoi par ChatGPT, c'est un enfer…

record.text: I find myself with thoughts. "If I'm riding the train and the train driver is trans how does that affect me?  Really?  Does being trans impede their ability to drive the train? If someone is doing literally anything (not directly involving me) and trans, how does that affect me?" Hint: It doesn't.

images.alt:
A train driver insisted they were not transgender but "just ugly" when challenged by colleagues after the Supreme Court ruling on gender.

The unnamed driver made the remark following April's ruling, in which the highest judges in the country said "sex" in equality law refers to biological sex.

The "just ugly" comment was quoted in a submission made by Aslef, the train drivers' trade union, to an Equality and Human Rights Commission (EHRC) consultation.

In its submission, Aslef said: "Since the ruling, there have been examples of our members being questioned about their biological sex by colleagues to the level where one member felt the need to explain to their colleagues that 'they are just ugly'.

Why use the free desktop app's for OpenAI's ChatGPT and Anthropic's Claude? A coder told me they have more direct API access or something. Basically it means they work better and faster than the web apps.

One time Claude's website was down, but the desktop app still worked. Reason enough for me to stick with the desktop app. But for free Sora access, you still need to use the web app. Oh and Perplexity has one, in the Windows & Mac app stores.

images.alt: Traditionelle Zeichnung eines großen Kopfes mit leeren Augenhöhlen und krummen quader artigen Zähnen die aus dem weit geöffneten Mund hervorstehen. Die Schädeldecke des Kopfes ist offen, man sieht ein sehr glattes Gehirn, das sich in schwebende Pixel auflöst. Aus Hirn und Mund läuft eine Schwarze Flüssigkeit. Unter dem Kopf sind zwei Hände an einer Tastatur zu sehen die lediglich einen knopf hat auf dem "Steal" engl. Für "stehlen" steht. An einer der Hand sind 6 Finger. Typisch für frühe fehler in der KI Bildgenerierung. An dem Kopf ist ein Namensschild auf dem "grok" steht. Ein sprachtext neben dem Kopf sagt "your style is mine now" als Anspielung darauf das KI Bildgenerierung auf Kunstdiebstahl beruht

record.text:
Maria. 20 years in U.S. and no criminal history.
She was in Yuma watching her grandson as her (Marine) son was leaving for training and her (Marine) daughter-in-law had a hip surgery.
When she came back to the base after a grocery run, she was detained, reported to CBP, now held in an ICE facility

images.alt:
tweet by Senator Mark Kelly @SenMarkKelly

I just left a visit to the ICE detention facility in Eloy. There’s a lot to absorb, but I want to tell you about a woman I met named Maria because her story really shows how messed up all this is. 

She’s been in the U.S. for twenty years. Has no criminal history. She was detained at the Marine Base in Yuma. Her son is a U.S. Marine stationed there. He’s married to another Marine. And they have a two-year-old kid, Maria's grandson.  

Maria was in Yuma because her son was leaving for training, her daughter-in-law had a hip surgery, and so they needed help watching her grandson. When she came back to the base after a grocery run, she was detained and reported to CBP. Now, she’s being held in an ICE facility. 

I remember how proud my parents were watching my brother and I get sworn into the Navy, so I asked her if she had been there when her son graduated from boot camp. She broke down in tears. All she could say was how proud of her son she was.  

That stuck with me. And it should stick with you. And if I have anything to do about it, it will stick with this administration. This woman loves America. Her son is risking her life for America – for us. She is the exact type of person we should want in this country. My team and I will keep fighting for her and her family.

1:43 AM · Aug 8, 2025 1.6M Views

tweet by Senator Mark Kelly @SenMarkKelly

I just left a visit to the ICE detention facility in Eloy. There’s a lot to absorb, but I want to tell you about a woman I met named Maria because her story really shows how messed up all this is. 

She’s been in the U.S. for twenty years. Has no criminal history. She was detained at the Marine Base in Yuma. Her son is a U.S. Marine stationed there. He’s married to another Marine. And they have a two-year-old kid, Maria's grandson.  

Maria was in Yuma because her son was leaving for training, her daughter-in-law had a hip surgery, and so they needed help watching her grandson. When she came back to the base after a grocery run, she was detained and reported to CBP. Now, she’s being held in an ICE facility. 

I remember how proud my parents were watching my brother and I get sworn into the Navy, so I asked her if she had been there when her son graduated from boot camp. She broke down in tears. All she could say was how proud of her son she was.  

That stuck with me. And it should stick with you. And if I have anything to do about it, it will stick with this administration. This woman loves America. Her son is risking her life for America – for us. She is the exact type of person we should want in this country. My team and I will keep fighting for her and her family.
